#TINA NOTES

####create a matrix
```{create a matrix}
> m <- matrix(nrow = 2, ncol = 3)
> m
 [,1] [,2] [,3]
[1,] NA NA NA
[2,] NA NA NA
> dim(m)
[1] 2 3
> attributes(m)
$dim
[1] 2 3

> m <- matrix(1:6, nrow = 2, ncol = 3)
> m
 [,1] [,2] [,3]
[1,] 1 3 5
[2,] 2 4 6
```


####subset data
```{subset data}
x <- c("a", "b", "c", "c", "d", "a")

u = x == "a"
x[u]


x <- list(foo = 1:4, bar = 0.6, baz = "hello")
name <- "foo"

x[[name]] 
x$foo

x <- list(a = list(10, 12, 14), b = c(3.14, 2.81))


#first column, third row
x[[c(1, 3)]]
x[[1]][[3]]

#second column, first row
x[[c(2, 1)]]

```
